post.body: Speech excerpt - "America, we are better than these last eight years. We are a better country than this." Amen
finally home 2 hours late. i am slowly getting my hours back.
time to put LB to bed. g'night, tweets!
Guy at the deli pulled the "Don't look so happy!" card. I'm sick. Leave me the F alone.
Just finished presentation for APPM on how to integrate multimedia training programs in newsroom. Not great attendance, but it was OK.
The TEMPTATIONS, an old school singing group might be comming over for our barbeque in a couple weeks!
Work and puppies running me ragged. Its days like this I could really use a drink or at least no social obligations other than boyfriend.
http:/www.inshokuten.com :html validation failed. AND css validation failed.
Juggling multiple projects at work, but the end is near on a couple. THE END IS NEAR, PEOPLE! THE END IS NEAR!
Floor seats! So many gays, where the hell is matt?
some times I feel underappreciated and sometimes I feel I deserve it.
Anyways, fuck it. I need bed.
Live NASCAR is pretty cool. Post-race traffic, not so much
Just got done BMXing, going to get some grub at the Golden Corral.
Medical helicopters on scene of the train crash. Some seriously injured passengers are being treated. Firefighters working to reach others
15 mile bike ride on Starting in Apopka heading towards the West Orange trail
Intrsting, just after my Fx sucks tweet I got an ad on twitterific trying to sell me some Fx tweeking plugin. Modern advertising is weird :/
Going to find danger with the werewolf.
Down and out tired and sleepy eyes are closing
have I mentioned how much I hate cooking?
